title: Bug 34515GTK: Cascade MenuItem doesn't support image
description: Bug 34515GTK: Cascade MenuItem doesn't support image RC2LinuxGTK1.
OB: The item in the pulldown has no icon. The buttons in the right toolbar(the ones with no chevron) retain their icons when they appear in thepulldown.
SR: Launch the ControlExample and go to the Coolbar tab.2. Select the SWT.DROPDOWN style.3. In the middle coolbar, grab the sash and pull it all the way to the leftsuch that the pulldown menu appears for the second item.4. Click on the pulldown arrow.5.
